## Analyzers (2)

### Vulners_IOC `v1.0`
Get information from the RST Threat Feed, which integrated with Vulners, for a domain, url or an IP address.

- **Author:** Dmitry Uchakin, Vulners team
- **License:** AGPL-V3
- **Data Types:** `url`, `domain`, `ip`
- **Configuration:** [.upstream/cortex/analyzers/Vulners/Vulners_IOC.json](https://github.com/nusantara-self/strangebee-integrations/blob/main/.upstream/cortex/analyzers/Vulners/Vulners_IOC.json) ([raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nusantara-self/strangebee-integrations/refs/heads/main/.upstream/cortex/analyzers/Vulners/Vulners_IOC.json))

### Vulners_CVE `v1.0`
Get information about CVE from powerful Vulners database.

- **Author:** Dmitry Uchakin, Vulners team
- **License:** AGPL-V3
- **Data Types:** `cve`
- **Configuration:** [.upstream/cortex/analyzers/Vulners/Vulners_CVE.json](https://github.com/nusantara-self/strangebee-integrations/blob/main/.upstream/cortex/analyzers/Vulners/Vulners_CVE.json) ([raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nusantara-self/strangebee-integrations/refs/heads/main/.upstream/cortex/analyzers/Vulners/Vulners_CVE.json))
